00197    BondPotentialImpl<Interaction>::BondPotentialImpl(System& system)
00198     : BondPotential(),

00200       interactionPtr_(0),
00201       isCopy_(false)

00209                          BondPotentialImpl<Interaction>& other)
00210     : BondPotential(other.system()),
00211       interactionPtr_(&other.interaction()),
00212       isCopy_(true)

00215    /* 
00216    * Destructor. 
00217    */
00218    template <class Interaction>
00219    BondPotentialImpl<Interaction>::~BondPotentialImpl() 
00220    {
00221       if (!isCopy_) {
00222          delete interactionPtr_;
00223          interactionPtr_ = 0;
00224       }
00225    }

00227    /* 
00228    * Read parameters from file.
00229    */
00230    template <class Interaction>
00231    void BondPotentialImpl<Interaction>::readParam(std::istream &in) 
00232    {
00233       // Read only if not a copy.  Do not indent interaction block.
00234       if (!isCopy_) {
00235          readBegin(in, "BondPotential");
00236          interaction().setNBondType(simulation().nBondType());
00237          bool nextIndent = false;
00238          readParamComposite(in, interaction(), nextIndent);
00239          readEnd(in);
00240       }
00241    }

00267    /*
00268    * Return bond energy for one Atom. 
00269    */
00270    template <class Interaction>
00271    double BondPotentialImpl<Interaction>::atomEnergy(const Atom &atom) const
00272    {
00273 
00274       Species::AtomBondArray bonds;
00275       const Bond* bondPtr;
00276       double rsq;
00277       double energy   = 0.0;
00278       int    iBond, nBond;
00279 
00280       atom.molecule().species().getAtomBonds(atom, bonds);
00281       nBond = bonds.size();
00282       for (iBond = 0; iBond < nBond; ++iBond) {
00283          bondPtr = bonds[iBond];
00284          rsq = boundary().distanceSq(bondPtr->atom(0).position(),
00285                                      bondPtr->atom(1).position());
00286          energy += interaction().energy(rsq, bondPtr->typeId());
00287       }
00288 
00289       return energy;
00290    }
00291 
00292    /* 
00293    * Calculate covalent bond energy.
00294    */
00295    template <class Interaction>
00296    double BondPotentialImpl<Interaction>::energy() const
00297    {
00298       double energy = 0.0;
00299       double rsq    = 0.0;
00300       System::ConstMoleculeIterator molIter;
00301       Molecule::ConstBondIterator bondIter;
00302 
00303       for (int iSpec=0; iSpec < simulation().nSpecies(); ++iSpec) {
00304          if (simulation().species(iSpec).nBond() > 0) {
00305             for (begin(iSpec, molIter); molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00306                for (molIter->begin(bondIter); bondIter.notEnd(); ++bondIter) {
00307                   rsq = boundary().
00308                         distanceSq( bondIter->atom(0).position(), 
00309                                     bondIter->atom(1).position());
00310                   energy += interaction().energy(rsq, bondIter->typeId());
00311                }
00312             } 
00313          }
00314       }
00315 
00316       return energy;
00317    }

00319    /* 
00320    * Add bonded pair forces to forces array.
00321    */
00322    template <class Interaction>
00323    void BondPotentialImpl<Interaction>::addForces() 
00324    {
00325       Vector force;
00326       double rsq;
00327       System::MoleculeIterator molIter;
00328       Molecule::BondIterator bondIter;
00329       Atom *atom0Ptr, *atom1Ptr;
00330       int iSpec;
00331 
00332       // Loop over all bonds in system
00333       for (iSpec=0; iSpec < simulation().nSpecies(); ++iSpec) {
00334          if (simulation().species(iSpec).nBond() > 0) {
00335             for (begin(iSpec, molIter); molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00336                for (molIter->begin(bondIter); bondIter.notEnd(); ++bondIter) {
00337                   atom0Ptr = &(bondIter->atom(0));
00338                   atom1Ptr = &(bondIter->atom(1));
00339                   rsq = boundary().distanceSq(atom0Ptr->position(), 
00340                                               atom1Ptr->position(), force);
00341                   force *= interaction().forceOverR(rsq, bondIter->typeId());
00342                   atom0Ptr->force() += force;
00343                   atom1Ptr->force() -= force;
00344                }
00345             }
00346          }
00347       }
00348    }

00350    /* 
00351    * Compute total stress (generic).
00352    */
00353    template <class Interaction>
00354    template <typename T>
00355    void BondPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStressImpl(T& stress) 
00356       const
00357    {
00358       Vector dr, force;
00359       double rsq;
00360       const Atom* atom0Ptr;
00361       const Atom* atom1Ptr;
00362 
00363       setToZero(stress);
00364 
00365       // Iterate over all bonds in System
00366       System::ConstMoleculeIterator molIter;
00367       Molecule::ConstBondIterator bondIter;
00368       for (int iSpec=0; iSpec < simulation().nSpecies(); ++iSpec) {
00369          if (simulation().species(iSpec).nBond() > 0) {
00370             for (begin(iSpec, molIter); molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00371                molIter->begin(bondIter); 
00372                for ( ; bondIter.notEnd(); ++bondIter) {
00373                   atom0Ptr = &(bondIter->atom(0));
00374                   atom1Ptr = &(bondIter->atom(1));
00375                   rsq = boundary().distanceSq(atom0Ptr->position(), 
00376                                               atom1Ptr->position(), dr);
00377                   force = dr;
00378                   force *= interaction().forceOverR(rsq, 
00379                                                   bondIter->typeId());
00380                   incrementPairStress(force, dr, stress);
00381                }
00382             }
00383          }
00384       }
00385 
00386       stress /= boundary().volume();
00387       normalizeStress(stress);
00388    }
00389 
00390    template <class Interaction>
00391    void BondPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStress(double& stress) const
00392    {  computeStressImpl(stress); }
